publications.title: Generation of an induced pluripotent stem cell line from a 3-month-old neonatal with a heterozygous dominant c.515C > A (p.Ala172Glu) variant in the ACTA1 gene

genomic_characterisation.summary: Karyotyping at passage 10 showed a normal male karyotype.
